com.beardedhen.androidbootstrap.api.defaults

Enum DefaultBootstrapBrand

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Enum<DefaultBootstrapBrand>
      • com.beardedhen.androidbootstrap.api.defaults.DefaultBootstrapBrand
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    BootstrapBrand, java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<DefaultBootstrapBrand>

    public enum DefaultBootstrapBrand
extends java.lang.Enum<DefaultBootstrapBrand>
implements BootstrapBrand
    Bootstrap provides 6 brands by default - Primary, Success, Info, Warning, Danger, and Default. Brands are often supplemented by view-specific colors, which are not globally used.

    • Enum Constant Summary
